sentences.sContent: Researchers at the University of Missouri looked at how viewers of these ads absorb the message.
sentences.sContent_eng: Researchers at the University of Missouri looked at how viewers of these ads absorb the message.
sentences.sCn: 密苏里大学的研究人员们观察了看这些广告的人如何接受这个讯息。

sentences.sContent: The family come from St Louis, Missouri, but on their webpage say they plan to travel around the US.
sentences.sContent_eng: The family come from St Louis, Missouri, but on their webpage say they plan to travel around the US.
sentences.sCn: 这一家人来自密苏里州圣路易斯市，但是他们在自己的网页上言明打算游遍全美国。
